name: i knew you in a past life
name_original: i knew you in a past life
description:
You’re idly swiping through a dating app one night, when you stumble across the profile of somebody you used to know. Somebody from long ago, when you were different people—in an entirely different life.

You both swipe right. 

---

i knew you in a past life is a text roleplaying game for two players, set within the interface of an imaginary dating app. As you play, the two of you will collaboratively uncover and tell the story of your shared past.

Though it begins with a dating app, this game is not necessarily about romance. It’s about being given a second chance to reach out to someone you thought you had left behind for good. What you will do with that chance is up to you.
